template.name: Agent_ListClientThenSite (csv)
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agents:
    model: agent
    only:
      - site__client__name
      - site__name
      - hostname
      - operating_system
    order_by: 
      - -site__client__name
      - site__name
      - hostname
    select_related:
      - site
      - site__client
    csv: 
      site__client__name: Client
      site__name: Site
      hostname: Hostname
      operating_system: Operating System
